meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'dd_googlesitemap'

languageKey.label: Sitemap priority:
0.0 (lowest)
0.5 (standard)
1.0 (highest)
Generate offline sitemap
Generates offline index file and sitemaps
eID script URLs (one per line):
Index file path:
URLs per sitemap:
Host is missing or does not match any of TYPO3 hosts from the installation.
This task can only fetch scripts from dd_googlesitemap, not other URLs.
'offset' and 'limit' parameters may not appear in the URL.
Index file path must be relative to the site's main directory. The referenced directory must exist (the default directory is created when the extension is installed).
Number of URLs must be positive.
Index file: `%1$s`
